shortDesc: Food Distribution and Supplies Management System using React, Redux for state management, RTK Query for efficient data fetching, and React Router DOM for navigation.

features.one: Home page with a navbar & banner slide with SwiperJs as well as more sections like Discover, Food Supplies and Gallery as well as Testimonials.
features.two: User registration and login functionality and Redux toolkit. Users can donate their own food and make community here.
features.three: Dashboard panel visualize with Charts and CRUD operation with food and people can make review from their

technology: React.js, Redux, TypeScript, Tailwind.css, Sonner, Express.js, and Mongodb

shortDesc: Grocery Store project aims to elevate user engagement and functionality using Next.js, Redux, Material Ui and more with shopping experience with customer satisfaction.

features.one: Home page with a navbar & a banner slide with SwiperJs animate as well as more section like Trending products, Category with aos and Fish route.
features.two: Products list with filtering option via price range, brand and rating & also can add to cart products then purchase from checkout page.
features.three: In Dashboard, admin can post fish products, can manage orders and user can see their orders progress in the my orders route

technology: Next.js, Redux, TypeScript, Tailwind.css, Node.js, Express.js, and Mongodb

shortDesc: With its user roles, data storage capabilities, and administrative functions, JobLinker simplifies job search and hiring process. It provides an effective solution for both.

features.one: Homepage with a banner, featured jobs, find seekers, blog, contact form and footer with some info. And also has some routes in Navbar.
features.two: After login, users can select their role whether he or she is HR or Job Seeker then they can post as their role. then post data will go in Mongodb.
features.three: In Dashboard, All will see their post specifically for manageing and here admin has various types of power to manage whole website.

technology: Next JS, Tailwind CSS with DaisyUI, Firebase, Toast, MongoDB, Git collaborate & Vercel
